divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about four objects and one yellow color was very bright deep red, no sound, starry night was cloudless. These object were seen in the city of Ponce to the south of the island, local radio listeners commented that the radios began calling on the lights that were observed. a friend told me that other people observed at the same time an object pass over his house and quietly disappearing immediately, people reported from the west zon at same time several red lights. The town of San German lady observed around 7 objects coming from the central highlands of the south island.
